name: Commando Dog
description:
Commando Dog - isometric, colorful action, with a top view. With modern graphics, and excellent music from rock artists.

The protagonist dog, nicknamed Dobi, is tired of the constant vampire raids. After the next raid, he decides to stand on 2 hind legs, put on his equipment, and pick up a cool shotgun. Then he goes to the lair of the vampires to save all the stolen puppies.


Game features:

• Stunning music from rock artists.
• Stylish design and graphics.
• Several types of weapons.
• Purchase of weapons.
• Several types of enemies, as well as 3 bosses.
• Dynamic special effects.
• Plot.
